content: SI SPX-M/H Sintered Diamond Wire (Concrete) Ultimate diamond wire designed for high speed and long life in all types of concrete and cast iron (15-30 kW wire saw) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond wires, floor saw blades, and wall saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate-performance diamond wire – built to cut faster, last longer and run more smoothly Engineered to handle demanding demolition, construction and refurbishing work Very fast and consistent cutting performance in reinforced concrete structures High-quality wire with very smooth running behavior – made of high-quality flexible rubber ensuring even use of beads for best cutting results Performs best on medium- to high-power wire saws Applications Cutting all types of concrete, from low to highly abrasive Cutting reinforced concrete Complex projects and demanding cutting applications Engineered to handle demanding demolition, construction and refurbishing work ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) Segment type: Sintered Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Base material | Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Segment type | Sintered | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Bead diameter | 0.4 in | Number of beads per meter | 40 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2294846 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-50 SI SPX-M/H - Package Size 1 pc - 2299888 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-25m SI SPX-M/H - Package Size 25 m - 2299887 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-50m SI SPX-M/H - Package Size 50 m - 2299886 - Diamond wire DS-W 10.5-100m SI SPX-M/H - Package Size 100 m
